sourcesContent:
import React, { useCallback, useEffect, useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import {
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    SimpleGrid,
    VStack,
    Input,
    FormHelperText,
    Box,
    Heading,
    Text,
    Stack,
    HStack,
    RadioGroup,
    Radio
} from '@chakra-ui/react';


export default function Form() {
    return (
        <>
        <VStack justifyContent="space-between" align="center" >
            <Heading textAlign="center" mb="10">Create a new passport</Heading>
            <Box maxWidth="750px" align="center" >
                <Text textAlign="center" >Create a new profile for your pet. If you already have an account connect to your wallet to view your NFT</Text>
            </Box>
        </VStack>
            <SimpleGrid columns={1} spacing={10}  m="120px">
                <VStack spacing={8} borderRadius={30} borderWidth={2} p={10} bg="#F4F2F2" color="grey">
                    <FormControl isRequired >
                        <FormLabel color="#6D5D5D">What's your pet's name?</FormLabel>
                        <Input type='name' borderColor="#B8B5B5" color="black" borderWidth={3} placeholder="What's your pet's name?" />
                    </FormControl>
                    <RadioGroup>
                        <HStack spacing="24px">
                            <Radio value='Sasuke'>Sasuke</Radio>
                            <Radio value='Nagato'>Nagato</Radio>
                            <Radio value='Itachi'>Itachi</Radio>
                        </HStack>
                    </RadioGroup>
                    <FormControl>
                        <FormLabel color="#6D5D5D">Email address</FormLabel>
                        <Input type='email' borderColor="#B8B5B5" color="black" borderWidth={3} />
                        <FormHelperText>We'll never share your email.</FormHelperText>
                    </FormControl>
                </VStack>
            </SimpleGrid>
        </>
    )
}
